presenter.name: Jong Ho Moon
presenter.title: Korea
presenter.bio: Cholangioscopy is better for tissue diagnosis in indeterminate biliary stricture?

slide.title: Cholangioscopy is better for tissue diagnosis in indeterminate biliary stricture?
slide.titleNormalized: cholangioscopy is better for tissue diagnosis in indeterminate biliary stricture?
slide.notes: Thank you very much Mr. chairperson. It is my great honor to be here.
slide.notesNormalized: thank you very much mr. chairperson. it is my great honor to be here.
slide.notesHtml: Thank you very much Mr. chairperson. It is my great honor to be here.
slide.text:
Cholangioscopy is Better for Tissue Diagnosis in Indeterminate Biliary Stricture?
Jong Ho Moon, MD, PhD Department of Internal Medicine Soon Chun Hyang University School of Medicine, KOREA EUS Summit 2019 Seoul, KOREA

slide.title: Methods for Tissue Diagnosis in Indeterminate Biliary Stricture
slide.titleNormalized: methods for tissue diagnosis in indeterminate biliary stricture
slide.notes: These are Methods for Tissue Diagnosis for (in Indeterminate [ |ɪndɪ|tɜːrmɪnət ]) Biliary Stricture.
slide.notesNormalized: these are methods for tissue diagnosis for (in indeterminate [ |ɪndɪ|tɜːrmɪnət ]) biliary stricture.
slide.notesHtml: These are Methods for Tissue Diagnosis for (in Indeterminate [ |ɪndɪ|tɜːrmɪnət ]) Biliary Stricture.
slide.text: Methods for Tissue Diagnosis in Indeterminate Biliary Stricture DIGESTIVE DISEASE CENTER SOON CHUN HYANG UNIVERSITY HOSPITAL ERCP EUS Cholangioscopy

slide.title: Tissue Sampling Techniques at ERCP
slide.titleNormalized: tissue sampling techniques at ercp
slide.notes: Tissue Sampling during ERCP can be done with Brush cytology, or Transpapillary endobiliary forceps biopsy.
slide.notesNormalized: tissue sampling during ercp can be done with brush cytology, or transpapillary endobiliary forceps biopsy.
slide.notesHtml: Tissue Sampling during ERCP can be done with Brush cytology, or Transpapillary endobiliary forceps biopsy.
slide.text: Tissue Sampling Techniques at ERCP Transpapillary endobiliary forceps biopsy Brush cytology Fine needle aspiration cytology Cytopathological analysis of retrieved plastic stents Multimodal tissue sampling DIGESTIVE DISEASE CENTER SOON CHUN HYANG UNIVERSITY HOSPITAL

slide.title: Problems with ERCP
slide.titleNormalized: problems with ercp
slide.notes: However, indirect radiologic imaging for the biliary tree is an inherited limitation of ERCP. It looks like a blind tissue sampling. (But, I think it can not be a limitation to Prof. Song.) .
slide.notesNormalized: however, indirect radiologic imaging for the biliary tree is an inherited limitation of ercp. it looks like a blind tissue sampling. (but, i think it can not be a limitation to prof. song.) .
slide.notesHtml:
However, indirect radiologic imaging for the biliary tree is an inherited limitation of ERCP. It looks like a blind tissue sampling.

(But, I think it can not be a limitation to Prof. Song.)

.
slide.text:
Problems with ERCP Indirect radiologic imaging for biliary tree Equivocal finding Difficult to differentiation of similar finding False negative finding Difficult to detect early lesion Dependent to operator, reader Unsatisfactory accuracy of tissue sampling Limited assessment of extent of disease Radiologic hazard
DIGESTIVE DISEASE CENTER SOON CHUN HYANG UNIVERSITY HOSPITAL Terheggen G, et al. Gastroenterol Clin N Am 2010;39:827

slide.title: Results of Transpapillary Forceps Biopsy (TPB) During ERCP in Suspected Malignant Biliary Stricture
slide.titleNormalized: results of transpapillary forceps biopsy (tpb) during ercp in suspected malignant biliary stricture
slide.notes: From our result, Accuracy of Transpapillary Forceps Biopsy (TPB) During ERCP was around 75%.
slide.notesNormalized: from our result, accuracy of transpapillary forceps biopsy (tpb) during ercp was around 75%.
slide.notesHtml: From our result, Accuracy of Transpapillary Forceps Biopsy (TPB) During ERCP was around 75%.
slide.text:
Pathological results, n (%) n=178 Malignant 126 Atypia 40 Benign 9 Non-diagnostic 3 Diagnostic yield, % (95% CI) Accuracy 74.7 (68.3‒81.1)
Results of Transpapillary Forceps Biopsy (TPB) During ERCP in Suspected Malignant Biliary Stricture CI, confidence interval Lee YN, Moon JH, et al. Cancer Medicine 2017;6:582

slide.title: Limitations of ERCP Based Tissue Sampling for Malignant Biliary Stricture by Pancreatic Cancer
slide.titleNormalized: limitations of ercp based tissue sampling for malignant biliary stricture by pancreatic cancer
slide.notes: Especially, ERCP Based Tissue Sampling for MBS by Pancreatic Cancer is very limited by several reasons, like…
slide.notesNormalized: especially, ercp based tissue sampling for mbs by pancreatic cancer is very limited by several reasons, like…
slide.notesHtml: Especially, ERCP Based Tissue Sampling for MBS by Pancreatic Cancer is very limited by several reasons, like…
slide.text: Limitations of ERCP Based Tissue Sampling for Malignant Biliary Stricture by Pancreatic Cancer Extrinsic compressed nature Mainly distally located stricture Desmoplastic reaction (fibrosis) Rösch T, et al. Gastrointest Endosc 2002;55:870

slide.title: IDUS; Biliary Stricture by Intrinsic Tumor
slide.titleNormalized: idus; biliary stricture by intrinsic tumor
slide.notes: This IDUS video shows Biliary Stricture by Intrinsic Tumor, it means endoluminal biopsy can be easy to get positive results
slide.notesNormalized: this idus video shows biliary stricture by intrinsic tumor, it means endoluminal biopsy can be easy to get positive results
slide.notesHtml: This IDUS video shows Biliary Stricture by Intrinsic Tumor, it means endoluminal biopsy can be easy to get positive results
slide.text: IDUS; Biliary Stricture by Intrinsic Tumor

slide.title: IDUS; Biliary Stricture by Extrinsic Tumor
slide.titleNormalized: idus; biliary stricture by extrinsic tumor
slide.notes: But, this video reveals Biliary Stricture by Extrinsic Tumor from here, it implies simple endoluminal biopsy can be difficult to get positive results.
slide.notesNormalized: but, this video reveals biliary stricture by extrinsic tumor from here, it implies simple endoluminal biopsy can be difficult to get positive results.
slide.notesHtml: But, this video reveals Biliary Stricture by Extrinsic Tumor from here, it implies simple endoluminal biopsy can be difficult to get positive results.
slide.text: IDUS; Biliary Stricture by Extrinsic Tumor

slide.title: Results of Transpapillary Forceps Biopsy (TPB) During ERCP in Suspected Malignant Biliary Stricture by Pancreatic Cancer
slide.titleNormalized: results of transpapillary forceps biopsy (tpb) during ercp in suspected malignant biliary stricture by pancreatic cancer
slide.notes: From our results, Accuracy of Transpapillary Forceps Biopsy (TPB) During ERCP in Suspected Malignant Biliary Stricture by Pancreatic Cancer was around 57%.
slide.notesNormalized: from our results, accuracy of transpapillary forceps biopsy (tpb) during ercp in suspected malignant biliary stricture by pancreatic cancer was around 57%.
slide.notesHtml: From our results, Accuracy of Transpapillary Forceps Biopsy (TPB) During ERCP in Suspected Malignant Biliary Stricture by Pancreatic Cancer was around 57%.
slide.text:
Pathological results, n (%) n=74 Malignant 40 (54.1) Atypia 23 (31.1) Benign 8 (10.8) Non-diagnostic 3 (4.1) Diagnostic yield, % (95% CI) Sensitivity 55.6 (44.1‒67.0) Specificity 100 (34.2‒100) Accuracy 56.8 (45.5‒68.0)
Results of Transpapillary Forceps Biopsy (TPB) During ERCP in Suspected Malignant Biliary Stricture by Pancreatic Cancer CI, confidence interval; EUS-FNAB, EUS-guided fine needle aspiration biopsy Lee YN, Moon JH, et al. UEGW 2015

slide.title: Beyond ERCP
slide.titleNormalized: beyond ercp
slide.notes: So, we need something Beyond ERCP.
slide.notesNormalized: so, we need something beyond ercp.
slide.notesHtml: So, we need something Beyond ERCP.
slide.text: Beyond ERCP Tissue sampling EUS-FNA/Biopsy Peroral cholangioscopic guided biopsy Imaging Probe-based confocal laser endomicroscopy (pCLE) Intraductal US

slide.title: Advantages of Digging with EUS-FNA/B for Malignant Biliary Stricture by Pancreatic Cancer
slide.titleNormalized: advantages of digging with eus-fna/b for malignant biliary stricture by pancreatic cancer
slide.notes: Contrary to endoluminal biopsy on ERCP, Digging with EUS-FNA/B have several advantages for Malignant Biliary Stricture by Pancreatic Cancer. So, it can be Superior than ERCP based tissue sampling
slide.notesNormalized: contrary to endoluminal biopsy on ercp, digging with eus-fna/b have several advantages for malignant biliary stricture by pancreatic cancer. so, it can be superior than ercp based tissue sampling
slide.notesHtml: Contrary to endoluminal biopsy on ERCP, Digging with EUS-FNA/B have several advantages for Malignant Biliary Stricture by Pancreatic Cancer. So, it can be Superior than ERCP based tissue sampling
slide.text: Advantages of Digging with EUS-FNA/B for Malignant Biliary Stricture by Pancreatic Cancer Extrinsic compressed nature Mass forming lesion Mainly distally located stricture Desmoplastic reaction (fibrosis) - Superior than ERCP based tissue sampling Rösch T, et al. Gastrointest Endosc 2002;55:870

slide.title: EUS-Guided Fine Needle Aspiration/Biopsy (EUS-FNA/B) in SCHBC DDC
slide.titleNormalized: eus-guided fine needle aspiration/biopsy (eus-fna/b) in schbc ddc
slide.notes:
We are using procore needle for EUS-FNA/B
((Also,) Core Biopsy Needle for EUS-FNA/B was developed to obtain simultaneous cytologic, and histologic core samples. (EUS-guided fine-needle biopsy (EUS-FNB) device with Procore reverse bevel technology was developed to obtain simultaneous cytologic and histologic core samples.))
slide.notesNormalized:
we are using procore needle for eus-fna/b
((also,) core biopsy needle for eus-fna/b was developed to obtain simultaneous cytologic, and histologic core samples. (eus-guided fine-needle biopsy (eus-fnb) device with procore reverse bevel technology was developed to obtain simultaneous cytologic and histologic core samples.))
slide.notesHtml:
We are using procore needle for EUS-FNA/B

((Also,) Core Biopsy Needle for EUS-FNA/B was developed to obtain simultaneous cytologic, and histologic core samples.

(EUS-guided fine-needle biopsy (EUS-FNB) device with Procore reverse bevel technology was developed to obtain simultaneous cytologic and histologic core samples.))
slide.text: EUS-Guided Fine Needle Aspiration/Biopsy (EUS-FNA/B) in SCHBC DDC Core biopsy needle ProCore needle (Cook, USA) Reverse bevel to hook and cut the tissue To obtain simultaneous cytologic aspirates/histologic core samples 19, 20, 22, 25 G Transgastric FNA/B; 22G Procore Transduodenal FNA/B; 25G Procore or Acquire Triple sampling On-site analysis; Diff-Quik (Giemsa stain) Cytology; Papanicolau stain Histology; H & E Immunohistochemical stain

slide.title: Results of EUS-FNAB with Negative for Malignancy on Transpapillary Forceps Biopsy in Suspected Malignant Biliary Stricture by Pancreatic Cancer
slide.titleNormalized: results of eus-fnab with negative for malignancy on transpapillary forceps biopsy in suspected malignant biliary stricture by pancreatic cancer
slide.notes: From our result, the accuracy of EUS-FNAB with Negative for Malignancy on Transpapillary Forceps Biopsy in biliary stricture by pancreatic cancer was 94%
slide.notesNormalized: from our result, the accuracy of eus-fnab with negative for malignancy on transpapillary forceps biopsy in biliary stricture by pancreatic cancer was 94%
slide.notesHtml: From our result, the accuracy of EUS-FNAB with Negative for Malignancy on Transpapillary Forceps Biopsy in biliary stricture by pancreatic cancer was 94%
slide.text:
Pathological results, n (%) n=34 Malignant 30 (88.2) Atypia 2 (5.9) Benign 2 (5.9) Non-diagnostic 0 Diagnostic yield, % (95% CI) Sensitivity 93.8 (85.4‒100) Specificity 100 (34.2‒100) Accuracy 94.1 (86.2‒100)
Results of EUS-FNAB with Negative for Malignancy on Transpapillary Forceps Biopsy in Suspected Malignant Biliary Stricture by Pancreatic Cancer
CI, confidence interval; EUS-FNAB, EUS-guided fine needle aspiration biopsy Lee YN, Moon JH, et al. Cancer Medicine 2017;6:582

slide.title: Disadvantages of EUS-FNA/B for Perihilar (Proximal) Biliary Stricture
slide.titleNormalized: disadvantages of eus-fna/b for perihilar (proximal) biliary stricture
slide.notes: However, the usefulness of EUS-FNA/B for Perihilar (Proximal) Biliary Stricturie is limited by several reasons, like…
slide.notesNormalized: however, the usefulness of eus-fna/b for perihilar (proximal) biliary stricturie is limited by several reasons, like…
slide.notesHtml: However, the usefulness of EUS-FNA/B for Perihilar (Proximal) Biliary Stricturie is limited by several reasons, like…
slide.text: Disadvantages of EUS-FNA/B for Perihilar (Proximal) Biliary Stricture Technical difficulty Mainly intrinsic nature Infiltrating lesion> mass forming lesion Risk of needle-tract seeding Khashab MA, et al. Gastrointest Endosc 2012;76:1024

slide.title: Cholangioscopy
slide.notes: Cholangioscopy provides direct visualization of the biliary tree (for many (novel) diagnostic and therapeutic procedures.) (Direct visualization of biliary tree using cholangioscopy) and improves the ability to characterize strictures.
slide.notesNormalized: cholangioscopy provides direct visualization of the biliary tree (for many (novel) diagnostic and therapeutic procedures.) (direct visualization of biliary tree using cholangioscopy) and improves the ability to characterize strictures.
slide.notesHtml:
Cholangioscopy provides direct visualization of the biliary tree (for many (novel) diagnostic and therapeutic procedures.)

(Direct visualization of biliary tree using cholangioscopy) and improves the ability to characterize strictures.
slide.text:
Cholangioscopy Direct visualization of the biliary tree and strictures with small caliber scope Improve ability to characterize strictures Additional diagnostic procedure Tissue sampling with biopsy forceps Enhanced endoscopy
DIGESTIVE DISEASE CENTER SOON CHUN HYANG UNIVERSITY HOSPITAL Kodama T, et al. Gastrointest Endosc 2004;59:895

slide.title: Tissue Sampling on Direct Visualization
slide.titleNormalized: tissue sampling on direct visualization
slide.notes: Tissue Sampling under direct visualization (using bigger biopsy forceps) is a major advantage of POC.
slide.notesNormalized: tissue sampling under direct visualization (using bigger biopsy forceps) is a major advantage of poc.
slide.notesHtml: Tissue Sampling under direct visualization (using bigger biopsy forceps) is a major advantage of POC.
slide.text:
Tissue Sampling on Direct Visualization Major advantage of POC Only means for providing a definitive diagnosis Critical role in identifying patients for surgical therapy With bigger biopsy forceps for high accuracy
DIGESTIVE DISEASE CENTER SOON CHUN HYANG UNIVERSITY HOSPITAL

slide.title: SpyGlass Direct Visualization System
slide.titleNormalized: spyglass direct visualization system
slide.notes: The SpyGlass (direct visualization) system (from Boston Scientific) provides very useful direct visualization of bile duct.
slide.notesNormalized: the spyglass (direct visualization) system (from boston scientific) provides very useful direct visualization of bile duct.
slide.notesHtml: The SpyGlass (direct visualization) system (from Boston Scientific) provides very useful direct visualization of bile duct.
slide.text: SpyGlass Direct Visualization System Boston Scientific, USA Direct visualization of bile duct Component Capital equipment SpyGlass direct visualization probe SpyScope access and delivery catheter Chen YK, et al. Gastrointest Endosc 2007;65:303, 832 DIGESTIVE DISEASE CENTER SOON CHUN HYANG UNIVERSITY HOSPITAL

slide.notes:
(Let me show some cases revealing the diagnostic roles of POC.) This case showed round filling defect on proximal BD on MRCP and ERCP
(This case showed stricture and filling defect on hilum. IDUS revealed intraductally growing papillary lesions)

slide.title: Diagnostic Accuracy of Forceps Biopsy Using SpyGlass Cholangioscopy for Indeterminate Biliary Strictures
slide.titleNormalized: diagnostic accuracy of forceps biopsy using spyglass cholangioscopy for indeterminate biliary strictures
slide.notes:
This study result by Dr. Draganov shows Forceps Biopsy on Spyglass system (under direct visualization for Indeterminate Biliary Strictures ) can significantly improve the Accuracy comparing with Standard forceps biopsy on ERCP.
(This study on the diagnostic accuracy of forceps biopsy using SpyGlass cholangioscopy for indeterminate biliary strictures provides an important message, because tissue sampling under direct visualization can significantly improve the accuracy of forceps biopsy or biliary strictures)
slide.notesNormalized:
this study result by dr. draganov shows forceps biopsy on spyglass system (under direct visualization for indeterminate biliary strictures ) can significantly improve the accuracy comparing with standard forceps biopsy on ercp.
(this study on the diagnostic accuracy of forceps biopsy using spyglass cholangioscopy for indeterminate biliary strictures provides an important message, because tissue sampling under direct visualization can significantly improve the accuracy of forceps biopsy or biliary strictures)
slide.notesHtml:
This study result by Dr. Draganov shows Forceps Biopsy on Spyglass system (under direct visualization for Indeterminate Biliary Strictures ) can significantly improve the Accuracy comparing with Standard forceps biopsy on ERCP.

(This study on the diagnostic accuracy of forceps biopsy using SpyGlass cholangioscopy for indeterminate biliary strictures provides an important message, because tissue sampling under direct visualization can significantly improve the accuracy of forceps biopsy or biliary strictures)
slide.text: Diagnostic Accuracy of Forceps Biopsy Using SpyGlass Cholangioscopy for Indeterminate Biliary Strictures Sensitivity (%) Specificity (%) Accuracy (%) Cytology brush 5.8 100 38.5 Standard forceps biopsy 29.4 100 53.9 Mini-forceps biopsy 76.5 100 84.6 using SpyGlass system Draganov PV, et al. Gastrointest Endosc 2012;75:347 DIGESTIVE DISEASE CENTER SOON CHUN HYANG UNIVERSITY HOSPITAL

slide.title: SpyGlass DS System
slide.titleNormalized: spyglass ds system
slide.notes:
SpyGlass DS shows Much better imaging quality, (and has Integrated visual probe in access catheter, very easy to set up and use, (with many helpful functions, like these.) Now, SpyGlass DS is Becoming the standard of POC at present)
with many functions, like these,
slide.notesNormalized:
spyglass ds shows much better imaging quality, (and has integrated visual probe in access catheter, very easy to set up and use, (with many helpful functions, like these.) now, spyglass ds is becoming the standard of poc at present)
with many functions, like these,
slide.notesHtml:
SpyGlass DS shows Much better imaging quality, (and has Integrated visual probe in access catheter, very easy to set up and use, (with many helpful functions, like these.) Now, SpyGlass DS is Becoming the standard of POC at present)

with many functions, like these,
slide.text: SpyGlass DS System Much better imaging quality (X4) Integrated visual probe in access catheter Easy to setup; plug and play Easy of use; automatic control of light/focus/white balance Greater controllability; consistent moving, semi-locking Consistent accessory exit point Dedicated irrigation & aspiration connections

slide.title: Diagnostic Yields of Forceps Biopsy Using SpyGlass DS for Indeterminate Biliary Strictures
slide.titleNormalized: diagnostic yields of forceps biopsy using spyglass ds for indeterminate biliary strictures
slide.notes:
Uday already reported high accuracy of forceps biopsy on Spyglass DS. (This study result shows Forceps Biopsy under direct visualization for Indeterminate Biliary Strictures can significantly improve the Diagnostic Accuracy comparing with Standard forceps biopsy on ERCP.)
(This study on the diagnostic accuracy of forceps biopsy using SpyGlass cholangioscopy for indeterminate biliary strictures provides an important message, because tissue sampling under direct visualization can significantly improve the accuracy of forceps biopsy or biliary strictures)
slide.notesNormalized:
uday already reported high accuracy of forceps biopsy on spyglass ds. (this study result shows forceps biopsy under direct visualization for indeterminate biliary strictures can significantly improve the diagnostic accuracy comparing with standard forceps biopsy on ercp.)
(this study on the diagnostic accuracy of forceps biopsy using spyglass cholangioscopy for indeterminate biliary strictures provides an important message, because tissue sampling under direct visualization can significantly improve the accuracy of forceps biopsy or biliary strictures)
slide.notesHtml:
Uday already reported high accuracy of forceps biopsy on Spyglass DS.

(This study result shows Forceps Biopsy under direct visualization for Indeterminate Biliary Strictures can significantly improve the Diagnostic Accuracy comparing with Standard forceps biopsy on ERCP.)

(This study on the diagnostic accuracy of forceps biopsy using SpyGlass cholangioscopy for indeterminate biliary strictures provides an important message, because tissue sampling under direct visualization can significantly improve the accuracy of forceps biopsy or biliary strictures)
slide.text: Diagnostic Yields of Forceps Biopsy Using SpyGlass DS for Indeterminate Biliary Strictures DIGESTIVE DISEASE CENTER & RESEARCH INSTITUTE SOONCHUNHYANG UNIVERSITY HOSPITAL Diagnosis based on SpyGlass DS biopsy (n=44), n (%) Sensitivity Specificity PPV NPV 17/20 (85.0) 24/24 (100) 17/17 (100) 24/24 (88.9) Navaneethan U, et al. Gastrointest Endosc 2016;84:649 PPV, positive predictive value; NPV, negative predictive value

slide.title: Disadvantages of SpyGlass DS
slide.titleNormalized: disadvantages of spyglass ds
slide.notes: However, still SpyGlass DS has several Disadvantages to be a routine clinical practice, (especially for Expensive equipment and accessories. So, It’s like a pie in the sky in many countries. Small working channel, --- can be Other Disadvantages.)
slide.notesNormalized: however, still spyglass ds has several disadvantages to be a routine clinical practice, (especially for expensive equipment and accessories. so, it’s like a pie in the sky in many countries. small working channel, --- can be other disadvantages.)
slide.notesHtml: However, still SpyGlass DS has several Disadvantages to be a routine clinical practice, (especially for Expensive equipment and accessories. So, It’s like a pie in the sky in many countries. Small working channel, --- can be Other Disadvantages.)
slide.text: Disadvantages of SpyGlass DS Expensive equipment and accessories 3000 USD/scope, 1000 USD/forceps, ??USD/capital system Single use only policy Limited reimbursement; USA, Germany, Singapore Small working channel (1.2 mm) Limited accessories; too stiff Spybite forceps Improved, but, average image quality Limited visual field; difficulty of complete examination on dilated bile duct Impossible of enhanced endoscopy

slide.title: Direct Peroral Cholangioscopy
slide.titleNormalized: direct peroral cholangioscopy
slide.notes: Direct POC is Direct insertion of ultra-slim endoscope into the bile duct (like conventional GFS, CFS).
slide.notesNormalized: direct poc is direct insertion of ultra-slim endoscope into the bile duct (like conventional gfs, cfs).
slide.notesHtml: Direct POC is Direct insertion of ultra-slim endoscope into the bile duct (like conventional GFS, CFS).
slide.text:
Direct Peroral Cholangioscopy Direct insertion of ultra-slim endoscope into the biliary tree through the papilla Visualization of the biliary tract using conventional endoscope
DIGESTIVE DISEASE CENTER SOON CHUN HYANG UNIVERSITY HOSPITAL

slide.title: Diagnostic Procedures with Direct POC
slide.titleNormalized: diagnostic procedures with direct poc
slide.notes: Diagnostic procedures with direct POC allows not only endoscopic visual observation by high image quality, but also effective tissue sampling, or enhanced endoscopy.
slide.notesNormalized: diagnostic procedures with direct poc allows not only endoscopic visual observation by high image quality, but also effective tissue sampling, or enhanced endoscopy.
slide.notesHtml: Diagnostic procedures with direct POC allows not only endoscopic visual observation by high image quality, but also effective tissue sampling, or enhanced endoscopy.
slide.text:
Diagnostic Procedures with Direct POC Endoscopic visual observation by high image quality Effective tissue sampling with big forceps biopsy by large working channel (2.0 – 2.2 mm) Enhanced endoscopy Target biopsy with NBI
DIGESTIVE DISEASE CENTER SOON CHUN HYANG UNIVERSITY HOSPITAL

Note: The results of immunohistochemical study; p53: Negative. CEA: Non-specific. Ki-67: Increased proliferating activity.

slide.title: Narrow-Band Imaging (NBI)
slide.titleNormalized: narrow-band imaging (nbi)
slide.notes: (Enhanced endoscopy can be performed easily with the slim endoscope.) Narrow-band imaging shows detailed images of the surface structure and of the mucosal microvessels.
slide.notesNormalized: (enhanced endoscopy can be performed easily with the slim endoscope.) narrow-band imaging shows detailed images of the surface structure and of the mucosal microvessels.
slide.notesHtml: (Enhanced endoscopy can be performed easily with the slim endoscope.) Narrow-band imaging shows detailed images of the surface structure and of the mucosal microvessels.
slide.text:
Narrow-Band Imaging (NBI) Easy of performance with ultra-slim endoscope Detailed images of surface structure and mucosal microvessels Emphasize mucosal structures Improves the utility of endoscopic images - Can be used to distinguish neoplastic from normal tissue
DIGESTIVE DISEASE CENTER SOON CHUN HYANG UNIVERSITY HOSPITAL

slide.title: Target Biopsy with NBI by POC in a Malignant Biliary Stricture 69/M
slide.titleNormalized: target biopsy with nbi by poc in a malignant biliary stricture 69/m
slide.notes: (Target biopsy with NBI by direct POC can be performed as well.) (This case shows a lumen-obstructing mass on the proximal BD.) (A balloon catheter was introduced, and the endoscope was advanced into the CBD.) On DPOC,yYou can see the normal inner surface of the CBD. This is the white-light image, and this is the NBI image. Here is the obstructing mass. (This is the WLI image, and this the NBI image of the surface of the mass.) NBI provides detailed views of the surface structure, mucosal microvessels, and margin of the lesion.
slide.notesNormalized: (target biopsy with nbi by direct poc can be performed as well.) (this case shows a lumen-obstructing mass on the proximal bd.) (a balloon catheter was introduced, and the endoscope was advanced into the cbd.) on dpoc,yyou can see the normal inner surface of the cbd. this is the white-light image, and this is the nbi image. here is the obstructing mass. (this is the wli image, and this the nbi image of the surface of the mass.) nbi provides detailed views of the surface structure, mucosal microvessels, and margin of the lesion.
slide.notesHtml: (Target biopsy with NBI by direct POC can be performed as well.) (This case shows a lumen-obstructing mass on the proximal BD.) (A balloon catheter was introduced, and the endoscope was advanced into the CBD.) On DPOC,yYou can see the normal inner surface of the CBD. This is the white-light image, and this is the NBI image. Here is the obstructing mass. (This is the WLI image, and this the NBI image of the surface of the mass.) NBI provides detailed views of the surface structure, mucosal microvessels, and margin of the lesion.

slide.title: Target Biopsy with NBI by Direct POC
slide.titleNormalized: target biopsy with nbi by direct poc
slide.notes: . The patient then underwent direct POC to find the cause of the BD dilatation. A balloon catheter was introduced, and the endoscope was advanced into the CBD. At the orifice of the left hepatic duct, luminal narrowing and ductal stricture were observed. NBI shows tumor vessels and the surface irregularities on the stricture.

At the orifice of the left hepatic duct, luminal narrowing and ductal stricture were observed. NBI shows tumor vessels and the surface irregularities on the stricture.

slide.notesHtml: Our group reported high accuracy of forceps biopsy on direct POC.
slide.text: Results of Forceps Biopsy Using Direct POC with Negative for Malignancy on Transpapillary Forceps Biopsy in Suspected Malignant Biliary Stricture (n=20) DIGESTIVE DISEASE CENTER & RESEARCH INSTITUTE SOONCHUNHYANG UNIVERSITY HOSPITAL Lee YN, Moon JH, et al. Endoscopy 2017;49:675-681 CI, confidence interval Sensitivity (95% CI) Specificity (95% CI) Accuracy (95% CI) 87.5 (52.9-97.8) 100 (74.1-100) 84.2 (74.1-100)

slide.title: Limitation of POC-guided Biopsy for Distal Biliary Stricture
slide.titleNormalized: limitation of poc-guided biopsy for distal biliary stricture
slide.notes: However, there are several limitations of POC-guided Biopsy for Distal Biliary Stricture
slide.notesNormalized: however, there are several limitations of poc-guided biopsy for distal biliary stricture
slide.notesHtml: However, there are several limitations of POC-guided Biopsy for Distal Biliary Stricture
slide.text:
Limitation of POC-guided Biopsy for Distal Biliary Stricture Technical difficulty: unstable, sharp angled position of POC Mainly extrinsic compressed mass lesion - Accuracy of intrinsic vs. extrinsic: 84% vs. 66% Expensive tool for diagnostic purpose (Spyglass DS)
Chen YK. Et al. Gastrointest Endosc 2011;74:805 Khashab MA. Et al. Gastrointest Endosc 2012;76:1024 DIGESTIVE DISEASE CENTER & RESEARCH INSTITUTE SOONCHUNHYANG UNIVERSITY HOSPITAL

slide.title: Diagnostic Approach for the Indeterminate Biliary Stricture
slide.titleNormalized: diagnostic approach for the indeterminate biliary stricture
slide.notes: So, Multidisciplinary approach based on the advantages and disadvantages of each modalities can maximize the positive result for Indeterminate Biliary Stricture
slide.notesNormalized: so, multidisciplinary approach based on the advantages and disadvantages of each modalities can maximize the positive result for indeterminate biliary stricture
slide.notesHtml: So, Multidisciplinary approach based on the advantages and disadvantages of each modalities can maximize the positive result for Indeterminate Biliary Stricture
slide.text: Diagnostic Approach for the Indeterminate Biliary Stricture DIGESTIVE DISEASE CENTER & RESEARCH INSTITUTE SOONCHUNHYANG UNIVERSITY HOSPITAL Origin of biliary stricture: Extrinsic vs. Intrinsic Location of biliary stricture: Proximal vs. Distal Cost-effectiveness of diagnostic modalities - “Multidisciplinary approach based on the advantages and disadvantages of each modalities”

slide.title: Tissue Acquisition for Diagnosis of Biliary Strictures Using Peroral Cholangioscopy or EUS-guided Fine-Needle Aspiration
slide.titleNormalized: tissue acquisition for diagnosis of biliary strictures using peroral cholangioscopy or eus-guided fine-needle aspiration
slide.notes: Very recently, our group did a study according to these concept.
slide.notesNormalized: very recently, our group did a study according to these concept.
slide.notesHtml: Very recently, our group did a study according to these concept.
slide.text: Tissue Acquisition for Diagnosis of Biliary Strictures Using Peroral Cholangioscopy or EUS-guided Fine-Needle Aspiration DIGESTIVE DISEASE CENTER & RESEARCH INSTITUTE SOONCHUNHYANG UNIVERSITY HOSPITAL Lee YN, Moon JH, et al. Endoscopy 2019;51:50 To evaluate the usefulness of a diagnostic approach using POC-guided forceps biopsy or EUS-FNAB according to the stricture location in patients with suspected malignant biliary stricture

slide.notes: At first we did a transpapillary forceps biopsy on ERCP. Accuracy was 72%. From patients with nonmalignant results on ERCP, We performed POC guided forceps biopsy for proximal biliary stricture, and EUS-FNAB for distal stricture.
slide.notesNormalized: at first we did a transpapillary forceps biopsy on ercp. accuracy was 72%. from patients with nonmalignant results on ercp, we performed poc guided forceps biopsy for proximal biliary stricture, and eus-fnab for distal stricture.
slide.notesHtml: At first we did a transpapillary forceps biopsy on ERCP. Accuracy was 72%. From patients with nonmalignant results on ERCP, We performed POC guided forceps biopsy for proximal biliary stricture, and EUS-FNAB for distal stricture.
slide.text: MBS; malignant biliary stricture; TPB; transpapillary forceps biopsy; POC, peroral cholangioscopy; EUS-FNAB, endoscopic ultrasonography-guided fine needle aspiration biopsy

slide.title: Diagnostic Yields of POC-guided Biopsy and EUS-FNAB for Indeterminate Bile Duct Strictures
slide.titleNormalized: diagnostic yields of poc-guided biopsy and eus-fnab for indeterminate bile duct strictures
slide.notes:
From the result, it showed high accuracy by combined with each modalities according to the stricture location.
This is the result about the diagnostic yields of POC-guided biopsy and EUS-FNAB for indeterminate bile duct strictures. The sensitivity of POC-guided biopsy in proximal group and EUS-FNAB in distal group was ninety four point four percent and ninety four point one percent, respectively. And, the overall diagnostic accuracy of POC-guided biopsy and EUS-FNAB was ninety five point seven percent and ninety four point seven percent, respectively.
slide.notesNormalized:
from the result, it showed high accuracy by combined with each modalities according to the stricture location.
this is the result about the diagnostic yields of poc-guided biopsy and eus-fnab for indeterminate bile duct strictures. the sensitivity of poc-guided biopsy in proximal group and eus-fnab in distal group was ninety four point four percent and ninety four point one percent, respectively. and, the overall diagnostic accuracy of poc-guided biopsy and eus-fnab was ninety five point seven percent and ninety four point seven percent, respectively.
slide.notesHtml:
From the result, it showed high accuracy by combined with each modalities according to the stricture location.

This is the result about the diagnostic yields of POC-guided biopsy and EUS-FNAB for indeterminate bile duct strictures. The sensitivity of POC-guided biopsy in proximal group and EUS-FNAB in distal group was ninety four point four percent and ninety four point one percent, respectively. And, the overall diagnostic accuracy of POC-guided biopsy and EUS-FNAB was ninety five point seven percent and ninety four point seven percent, respectively.
slide.text:
Diagnostic Yields of POC-guided Biopsy and EUS-FNAB for Indeterminate Bile Duct Strictures Pathological results, n Pathological results, n Location of strictures Location of strictures Pathological results, n Pathological results, n POC-guided biopsy in proximal group (n=31) EUS-FNAB in distal group (n=27) Malignant Malignant 24 24 Atypia Atypia 6 1 Benign Benign 1 2 Nondiagnostic Nondiagnostic 0 0 Diagnostic yields, % (95% CI) Diagnostic yields, % (95% CI) Diagnostic yields, % (95% CI) Sensitivity 92.3 (74.9‒99.1) 92.3 (74.9‒99.1) 96.0 (79.7‒99.9) Specificity 100 (47.8‒100) 100 (47.8‒100) 100 (15.8‒100) Accuracy 93.6 (84.9‒100) 93.6 (84.9‒100) 96.3 (89.2‒100) CI, confidence interval; POC, peroral Cholangioscopy; EUS-FNAB, EUS-guided fine needle aspiration biopsy; NA, not available
DIGESTIVE DISEASE CENTER & RESEARCH INSTITUTE SOONCHUNHYANG UNIVERSITY HOSPITAL Lee YN, Moon JH, et al. Endoscopy 2019;51:50

slide.title: Diagnostic Algorithm for Indeterminate Biliary Stricture
slide.titleNormalized: diagnostic algorithm for indeterminate biliary stricture
slide.notes: So, In summary, I would like to suggest this kind of algorithm for tissue diagnosis of Indeterminate Biliary Stricture. ERCP-guided tissue sampling can be the first trial for Suspected MBS with obstructive jaundice. And then, POC-guided tissue sampling or EUS-FNAB can be performed by the location or nature of biliary stricture.
slide.notesNormalized: so, in summary, i would like to suggest this kind of algorithm for tissue diagnosis of indeterminate biliary stricture. ercp-guided tissue sampling can be the first trial for suspected mbs with obstructive jaundice. and then, poc-guided tissue sampling or eus-fnab can be performed by the location or nature of biliary stricture.
slide.notesHtml: So, In summary, I would like to suggest this kind of algorithm for tissue diagnosis of Indeterminate Biliary Stricture. ERCP-guided tissue sampling can be the first trial for Suspected MBS with obstructive jaundice. And then, POC-guided tissue sampling or EUS-FNAB can be performed by the location or nature of biliary stricture.
slide.text: Diagnostic Algorithm for Indeterminate Biliary Stricture Suspected MBS with obstructive jaundice* Distal biliary stricture Staging work-up and treatment ERCP-guided tissue sampling ± IDUS POC-guided tissue sampling EUS-FNAB Location of biliary stricture Proximal biliary stricture Malignancy (+) Malignancy (−) Malignancy (+) Malignancy (−) Consider EUS-FNAB ± repetitive ERCP Consider repetitive ERCP ± POC * Distal biliary stricture due to a definite extrinsic mass may be approached first by EUS-FNAB rather than ERCP-guided tissue sampling. Lee YN, Moon JH, et al. Endoscopy 2019;51:50
